title: List of Everton F.C. managers
summary: Everton F.C. is a professional association football club based in Liverpool, England. The club was founded in 1878, but did not participate in competitive football until 1887, when they first took part in the FA Cup. The club has had 26 permanent managers, though this role was previously filled by the club secretary. Their current manager is Spaniard Rafael Ben√≠tez.
